snippet.title: Wayward Beta 2.0 Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/379210

Wayward is a turn-based, top-down, wilderness survival roguelike. Explore, build, and most importantly survive in these unforgiving lands.

More information: http://www.waywardgame.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/waywardgame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Wayward_Game
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Wayward/
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/0W1JEHHVVKmaxyP9
